Farm:
A simple pen, used for holding livestock. 
Passively generates Food.

A small farm, with room for both animals and crops. 
Increases Food generation.

A farm large enough to feed all who hunger. 
Further increases Food generation.

It smells of Death, yet sustains Life. 
Greatly increases Food generation.

Blood begets Blood, Their Flesh fuels Ours. 
Massive Food generation.
Church:
A shrine, to which prayers may be directed. 
Passively generates Faith.

A chapel, where beliefs can be shared in harmony. 
Increases Faith generation.
